name: DRILL BILL
description:
In DRILL BILL, you play as...Drill Bill! With your trusty drill in hand, jump, dash, and shoot your way up a mountain. What waits for you at the top? Who knows!

(This game was made in 10 days for the VimJam 2 game jam. The theme was "On The Edge".)

Controls (Keyboard Only):

WASD - Move/Jump

K - Drill Dash/Confirm

L - Drill Shot

Esc - Give Up

*If possible, it's recommended you play the Windows version
